summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6245 for the improvement of West 57th Street from Seaview Ave. to approximately 100 feet west thereof; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89991, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
